means: 脾气暴躁的老妇人，老泼妇

sentence.Network_en: She was a mean old harridan.

PerfectNetExp.abs: GRE逆序_馆档网 ... pecan 美洲山核桃树 harridan 凶恶的老妇，老巫婆 randan 欢闹，狂欢.

不好 - English translation - bab.la... ... 医治不好的 hopeless 名声不好的老泼妇 harridan 脾气不好的 fractious.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent. (originally slang): perhaps from French haridelle 'old horse'

entry.def: If you call a woman a harridan, you mean that she is unpleasant and speaks too forcefully.

example.ex: She was a mean old harridan.

auth_sentence.content: Always the gentleman, hen-pecked by his harridan wife.
auth_sentence.res_content: Always the gentleman, hen-pecked by his harridan wife.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Always the gentleman, hen-pecked by his harridan wife.

auth_sentence.content: He...had a virulent curse-hurling harridan of a sister.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: He...had a virulent curse-hurling harridan of a sister.

auth_sentence.content: She was a fat, barren harridan, jealous of a beautiful mother-to-be.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: She was a fat, barren harridan, jealous of a beautiful mother-to-be.
